tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE remote_sensing_metadata (
    image_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    image_name VARCHAR(255),
    image_date DATE,
    sensor_type VARCHAR(50),
    dataset_id UUID,
    resolution DECIMAL(5,2)
)

CREATE TABLE datasets (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    dataset_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    dataset_description TEXT,
    dataset_size INT,
    created_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE remote_sensing_images (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    image_name VARCHAR(255),
    image_path TEXT,
    image_size INT,
    capture_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE remote_sensing_datasets (
    dataset_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    dataset_name VARCHAR(255),
    dataset_description TEXT,
    dataset_size INT,
    created_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE images (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(50),
  resolution INT,
  image_url VARCHAR(255),
  capture_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE datasets (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(50),
  description TEXT,
  created_date DATE,
  last_updated_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE dataset_images (
  dataset_id INT,
  image_id INT,
  PRIMARY KEY (dataset_id, image_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (dataset_id) REFERENCES datasets(id),
  FOREIGN KEY (image_id) REFERENCES images(id)
);

CREATE TABLE image_metadata (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  image_id INT,
  metadata_key VARCHAR(50),
  metadata_value TEXT,
  FOREIGN KEY (image_id) REFERENCES images(id)
);
